DOC.criteria: Subject female 21 year old AND HAS AT LEAST ONE OF THE FOLLOWING No evidence pelvic organ prolapse prior pelvic surgery Stage 1 great pelvic organ prolapse affect one vaginal compartment prior pelvic surgery Stage 2 great pelvic organ prolapse affect one vaginal compartment reconstructive surgery schedule Active skin infection ulceration within vagina Presence vaginal septum ; Active cancer colon , rectum wall , cervix , vaginal , uterus bladder ; Ongoing radiation therapy pelvic cancer ; Impacted stool Recent ( less three month ) pelvic surgery ; Significant preexist pelvic pain include levator ani syndrome , severe vaginismus vulvodynia ; Severe hemorrhoid Surgically absent rectum bladder Significant circulatory cardiac condition could cause excessive risk examination determine attend physician
